about_the_game:
Parafron is an action thriller, story-driven game, where your decisions shape the evolving narrative. Unravel the hidden meaning behind what appears to be a normal and healthy environment, questioning the truth of your surroundings. But beware, appearances can be deceiving, and you may not like what you discover.

Features:

  • First-Person perspective, we want you to really feel like you are there.
  • Story-driven decisions will unravel the mysteries of the game in ways you won't expect. Each choice you make matters!
  • Fighting to survive and defusing hostile situations.
  • Sneaking is a critical part of wanting to go unnoticed.
  • AI: interesting conversations may occur if you know where to look. ;)
  • Multiple endings, almost like a hard reset
  • Traumatic experiences: discovering the transition of a human's physiology

Gameplay:

  • Shape your destiny: Your decisions have profound consequences and lead to multiple endings.
  • Fight or Evade: Survive hostile encounters, master sneaking to avoid danger.
  • Uncover Hidden Truths: Engage with AI characters, unravel secrets, shed light on the enigmatic world.
  • Journey through Humanity's Transition: Witness emotional moments revealing the human physiological shift.
  • Unfathomable "Parafron": Discover the true meaning behind the enigmatic concept.
  • Prepare for the Unexpected: Challenge perceptions with multiple reality-altering endings.
  • Unseen Horizons Await: Thrilling adventure with gripping gameplay and emotional narrative.
  • Define your fate: Choose wisely in a world of wonders, dangers, and unexpected discoveries.
